Review.Titre: DO NOT USE THIS WEBSITE
Review.Contenu: DO NOT USE THIS WEBSITE! Site123 has been a colossal waste of money. They billed my credit card after I had cancelled my auto-renew. This is a practice a lot of dodgy providers use and is called “negative option marketing”. They agreed to a partial refund after I made a dispute on PayPal. After the dispute was closed they did not issue a refund and ceased contact. I have had to reopen the dispute. Shameful and unethical practice. There are so many more affordable, easy to use and ethical website creators. Save your time and your money and don’t use SITE123.

Review.Titre: My site suddenly became unavailable !
Review.Contenu: My site suddenly became unavailable !! no warning no explanation. It was a free package so it should not disappear. The assistance told me it was blocked but couldn't say why. They gave me a support email to contact that never replied despite multiple reminders. DON'T TRUST to put your business on this website. You could lose everything without notice.

Review.Titre: Terrible accounting
Review.Contenu: Terrible accounting. Even after you cancel auto-renewal and close your account, they will debit your credit card years later. I finally had to report them for Credit Card Fraud.

Review.Titre: Dodgy Policies
Review.Contenu: SITE123 is not transparent in their auto-renew policy. They have it set to auto-renew in the settings when you join, so when it rolls around to renewing, they don’t ask permission and take the funds from your account. In my opinion this is dodgy and is how they make their money as they refuse to refund you. Honestly I would say spend your money elsewhere, their services are hardly worth the money you pay. There are plenty of user friendly affordable website platforms out there that are better than site123.

Review.Titre: Site123.com practices are sleazy and unethical
Review.Contenu: Site123 apparently has "auto-renew" set as a default and when you sign up with them, they do not disclose this.  We received an unexpected charge in the amount of $536 on our credit card.  Site123 has no published phone number or email address to communicate with them.  One must use a chat function.  They will then send a link to their billing department.  When we contacted them, we were informed that the "auto-renew" was disclosed in the small print in the "user agreement" that no one ever reads. Nor did they send us any warning that we would be billed again.  We notified within 24 hours of the charge on our credit card that  we didn't wish to auto-renew and requested a full refund.  We had to wait 4 business days before we received their response that their policy was "no refunds." DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS UNETHICAL COMPANY.

Review.Titre: Great websites, very dodgy company

Keep close watch on your account for double charging, they charged the website renewal price twice to my credit credit card (nothing to do with the domain charges which are charged at a different time). They even have an option for "I have been doubled charged" in their billing complaints list to choose from, so this seems like a regular incident. Very sketchy

Unable to escalate this as there is no-one to speak to so keep going around in circles for over 7 weeks.The best advice the technical department could give me was to try a different domain name!!!Very disappointed!!

I have sent an email to the suggested address already but will be sending another. Unacceptable and scammy service DO NOT USE!

Review.Titre: SEE THIS BEFORE JOINING
Review.Contenu: NEVER AGREE TO THE RENEW OPTION. DO NOT LET THEM HAVE YOUR BANK INFORMATION. We tried to change plans to the cheaper option prior to the renew date (we have the screen shot), and despite our attempts in advising SITE123 billing department, our bank account was charged with the more expensive plan to top this an invoice was produced prior to the renew date indicated on their site. We gave SITE123 half a day to sort this up and come with a solution with zero results. make no mistake We offered to pay for cheaper plan in full, yet we been billed for another plan (more expensive) at the very same time.We feel cheated, we feel the newcomer payment setup is a trap offering a big discount so you will opt for the more expensive plan and then push renew and forget about it (WE DIDNT). Sadly, since we asked for answers and gave a grace time to sort it up (should have been easy) our Emails were ignored. Now it's up to you, as for us, our screen shots and relevant emails are going to be sheard with authorities, action is going to be taken by us, stay safe online and maybe learn from our experience.

Review.Titre: Don't do business with SITE 123
Review.Contenu: I had to change my review once again because dealing with Benjamin the technical support online, I am finding they do not know how to assist with technical issues in transferring of a web domain nor are they interested in keeping customers with SITE123. After speaking with Thomas for the past week, I thought I had my issue of domain transfer resolved. However, I still cannot pull up my website through Site123 like I thought. I noticed my webpage did not pull up online. Therefore, I reached out to my old provider to ensure they deactivated my domain. In doing so, they instructed me that SITE 123 needs to reset the DNS so that my website could go live with their web platform. However, Benjamin explained that it was live and could be seen online and that there was nothing SITE 123 needed to do. I explained I would have to get a return of my money since my site was not going live. He chatted that the email address and gave me the number to call to deactivate my account. Therefore, SITE 123 will be losing business today because the online chat team does not know how to assist. You can only reach SITE123 technical team via online chat. This is a terrible way to do business when it comes to IT support. Although the sites platform is easy to set up, you get no technical support from this company because everything is done online. You never get a live voice and if the person you are working with is not available you will get a terrible representative like Benjamin that cannot assist, is very rude, and does not have interest in promptly assisting customers. At the end of the day, this situation has caused me to lose business because I cannot get my domain transferred. Very upset!

Review.Titre: Fraudsters - illegal charges
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: Site123 in its response tries to look reasonable and accommodating but they only took action when I cancelled my account and threatened to file complaints with relevant authorities and regulators. Further, the refund was issued via PayPal after I contacted them and filed a complaint regarding the charges. The refund was from PayPal, not Site123. My opinion of Site123 remains unchanged. Anyone looking for a website builder would do well to look elsewhere. There are plenty of options. Do your homework. ORIGINAL POST - This site is based in Israel and do not follow the laws of US or Canada and take advantage of their location with respect to unauthorized charges. My account was auto charged despite my advising Site123 that I did not wish to Rene and despite my account settings have their “auto-renew” option set to “disabled”. They charged my card anyway then refuse to refund the money. I now have to try to get the credit card co/paypal to reverse charges. Avoid this service. They are a scam and will take your money.

Review.Titre: Horrible Customer Support...
Review.Contenu: My website was/is UnitedStatesHistory.US. This was to be an e-commerce site to sell mostly history books. I liked the software until I found a logic flaw. In charging a sales tax, I discovered that the tax didn't show up as a detail line along with the cost of each book and shipping, so the calculated total did not include the tax. Then, on the payment page, the charged amount included the tax. Surprise!!!! I reported this problem and was assigned a trouble ticket number LPvsg2wm. On follow-up inquiries to see where my issue stood, I was told that my issue was thrown in with all other projects and developments. I couldn't get a commitment as to how long it would take. I suggested two days, two weeks, two months, two years. They had no idea. There seemed to be a much stronger effort to develop new templates and support getting new business than to support the business they already had. I gave up and requested a refund.Supplemental Review:I would like to buy back in, but you still haven't addressed the issue of leaving customers hanging and wondering if their issue will ever be addressed. Communicate, communicate, communicate. When you address this communication issue positively, I'll change my 2 stars to 5 stars and my review title to "Great Company with Super Customer Support."

Review.Contenu: Here's my experience. I made a lovely website with site123. It was a good experience, and I agreed to keep the tacky banner because it was a free service. Suddenly today, a long time later, I try to update my website and it won't allow it unless I pay for an upgrade. They tell me I'm way over, and they don't know why it would have allowed me to add so much content. Well, I have an idea. Because now that I have business cards printed and the website all made it's going to be a lot harder to change to another service. But they underestimate my stubbornness and my cheapness.

Review.Titre: Good things and bad things

It's also easy to arrange products into categories and overall the store function is pretty good even if we don't use it for selling products online, but mainly showcasing them.Bad things: the level of customization the editor allows is not sufficient. Adding pictures, text boxes and other elements on the site is very limited and has to be done only in the framework of the existing templates. If there's no template for your idea of the site it's not really possible to have enough creative freedom to drag things where you want them to be. Great and quick customer support.Overall: An easy choice and a good option for a starter online shop or other small business. But the lack of freedom makes me want to look at other alternatives for the future.

However, I'm not crazy about your pricing.

Review.Titre: Issue taking too long to be solved
Review.Contenu: The issue I encountered isn't solved yet for more than  month. As per the support they are great people, but technically talking the issue is still under process and I don't see why the team isn't as much tecchy savvy. I tried helping in so many ways but useless. I still don't know where I am or what to do!!!!

Review.Titre: I Finally have a website.
Review.Contenu: I had a wonderful experience especially that I needed a website I could use urgently. The only down side was that there wasn't many options when it came to choosing the events page. It was limited and I just had to settle for what was available.Thank you anyway, I finally have a website of my own. Grace

Review.Titre: Easy platform that does the job but fails in the small stuff
Review.Contenu: A super easy platform that really does the job of helping you build a website in no time compared to other platforms. I was somewhat disappointed that some features were uneditable like a strip underline under headlines that you can't delete or some pages with images that you cant resize the image next to the text. Also, there is minimal control over colors - only the main website layout which is a huge problem.

Review.Titre: This site COULD be so much better... Shame.
Review.Contenu: This site would be so much better and the cream of the crop, if it offered an actual pay monthly plan. I only intend to use it for information regarding my hobby, and therefore any payment for a website is just additional dead outgoings, with no additional income. Due to this, I certainly can't warrant paying out a large sum, whereas a smaller monthly fee would have been acceptable. If this had been the case, I would have started a plan over a two or three year period, to reduce the outlay of my hobby.

Review.Titre: It's overall very good
Review.Contenu: It's overall very good, just doesn't have what I need. It does not show up when you search online and the donations page did not work. You need to pay for anything useful.

Review.Titre: My problem was not resolved
More advanced options please.
Review.Contenu: I thought I would have a lot more options once I purchased a plan, but everything is still the same.  The design templates are extremely limited to what is there, and simple things, like buttons colors and overall background colors are not changeable.  I wished there were advanced design options for the site.

Review.Titre: i can't  access my website yet.
Can be 5 stars in the future
Review.Contenu: There could be lots more options available to push this to 5 stars. No members only section for pages. Also the price chart doesn't allow much editing to your cart options. We are a digital only and yet my members have to add address details. If I go ecommerce page i have this option but then can't do subscriptions. Very easy building site to use however its just missing a few options.

Review.Titre: Amateur Me Did A Website in 1.5 days...
Review.Contenu: Logged onto site123. Got started right away put my business website together with ease. Guidance was offered to me by the on line virtual assistants. My domain was set and site123 published my website!!!! Received great feedback from all. Who did your website they asked!!!!!!You rock site123

Review.Titre: I like but you have some misstakes
Review.Contenu: I like the site123. I really do. But sometimes happening too many intresting things. For exaple, the thanks message, doesn't appear to my customers. Why? Nobody know...Sometimes my prices disappear. Why? I don't know, but I always publish my changes.When I ask the support, I always get an answer like that, "ok. This is a ticket numer about your question/problem".And nothing happening after this  little conversation!

Review.Titre: design engine but with limitations
Review.Contenu: Good interactive design engine but with limitations. Insertion of media, pics or starting with a blank page of one's own choice is not possible.My request of fixing reservation calendar could not be addressed to, from last two years. Despite my numerous requests it wasn't fixed neither a response was given.New models need to be included.Site should also propose forms.

Review.Titre: Dear Sir
Review.Contenu: Dear SirWe ask to improve the services and the paragraphs that we are working on by adding paragraphs on the siteParagraphs can be controlled by merging, sorting, or changing measurementsAfter subscribing for a year, there is a free domain in the offer. But we didn't get it because we had to use our external domainWe require that the domain be included in the subscription

Review.Titre: Removing newsletter acceptance box
Review.Contenu: Hi, Luis helped me and he was courteous, timely, and helpful in that he shared the pertinent info I requested. However, I requested instructions on how to remove the box accepting a newsletter on the registration form of the scheduling page and was told it can’t be done. Newsletter are not as common these days and there should be an option to delete that option. I don’t have a newsletter so I just wrote an explanation that Site 123 doesn’t have an option to remove it so they know why it’s there.

Review.Titre: COST and The mobile interface doesn't function…
Review.Contenu: The mobile interface doesn't function normally.  For instance, the mailing on the phone interphase cannot search for items, does not allow to scroll writeups,  and makes navigation difficult.  The purchasing deal is not transparent. Aside from it being relatively more expensive that other providers, I only got to know that the payments made for the domain lasts for a period that is different from the site name acquisition. This is absolutely unacceptable.  I am considering moving away.

Review.Titre: Its an easy and intuitive platform to…
Review.Contenu: Its an easy and intuitive platform to use. However, the customers often cannot download their digital purchases requiring me to have to mail them directly. Despite numerous attempts to resolve this, no progress has been made. It doesnt offer a news or story page to act as a diary or interest page for potential customers

Review.Titre: The service is excellent
Review.Contenu: The service is excellent.  The problem with the software is that if you want to update a directory you can not ask it to take only the new items from a file.  It is not possible to scroll through the file and directory on the site to try to check what already exists and what does not exist and this causes the whole file to be moved again and then for hours delete the duplicate.

Review.Titre: My feedback
Review.Contenu: The admin part is very nice with good videos and pictures, easy to use. The issue is that I can't bring my website somewhere else just for money. Helpdesk guys are kind.

Review.Titre: Playing Tricks with Rates
Review.Contenu: Rate was going to double at renewal; called to ask for better price. They said no, I canceled and started to make a new webpage. Then got an automated offer for a huge discount.... Was a huge pain in the back to have my website down for a week. Ended up renewing because it was a good price; but I already have a back up website made and ready to launch incase they pull that stunt again.

Review.Titre: Building my website is more involved than I thought
Review.Contenu: Building my website is more involved than I realized. Have spent hours and still not complete. The assistance via chat is very good, though. Have had to use chat many times to get instruction on how to proceed with functions needed on my site. I will get back to it again later today hope to finish it by the end of the week...3 more days to work on it.

Review.Titre: Overall its fine but the domain given…
Review.Contenu: Overall its fine but the domain given is out of my mind its a mixture of letters and digits and its so strange. If you can give me a suitable free domain with your 123 domain, it will be useful then.I have sent a message regarding this but didn't hear about it yet.  Something like this will be of use...Www.tarkato.123site.com or close to this, but i got actually is just waste.

Review.Titre: I am disappointed in the fact that on…
Review.Contenu: I am disappointed in the fact that on at least three occasions I have spoken with your staff regarding an option of standard banners being available instead of just buttons (customer option) and my suggestion has basically been ignored. Not all customers  simply want a button option and I have had to tell my loyal customers no over and over again.

Review.Titre: Site 123 is a very simple and a good…
Review.Contenu: Site 123 is a very simple and a good platform to create your website, one thing boring is that they dont use or allow all payment gateways, like me I'm in south Africa and our popular gateway here is payfast, and they dont support payfast. As a result I had to leave them.

Review.Titre: Your chaps are very happy to answer…
Review.Contenu: Your chaps are very happy to answer questions and respond quickly.  However, the site is not as versatile as some.  It doesn't allow enough flexibility in the design of pages.  I feel it would be a good idea for your chaps to offer to refer areas where they can't help to management for future improvement.

Review.Titre: i think there is a lot of things to…
Review.Contenu: i think there is a lot of things to migrate ' sometimes there a difficulties with configuring and customizing some things , there is a big problem with authentication when you make a site for a client to give him permissions to update store or pictures and etc.

Review.Titre: 3 stars
Review.Contenu: Good afternoon. Everything seems to be fine, but it's taking a long time. Besides, sometimes when editing a product the page becomes white. And one more thing. Add the ability to move products not one, but several at once. I want to move several items, but I can not choose. Only one I can move. It's really annoying.

Review.Titre: It is beyond belief that a “ make your…
Review.Contenu: It is beyond belief that a “ make your own website” company doesn’t have something as simple as an “insert text box” feature. Online print companies do, and other  website builders do, but not this company. I have a federally mandated disclaimer that must go on  every page of the site, so i cannot use this company for my website. Boggles the mind, actually.*- a follow up on my review. I came up with my own workaround for my site, so I did decide to go with SITE 123. Its not perfect, but it does look good. Im hoping they will take this review and add this simple feature in the future.

Review.Titre: We need the currency changed for…
Review.Contenu: We need the currency changed for Romania badly ! make the currency show after the amount so that it would look normal.and so that the clients dont mistake the pcs with priece   there is no symbol for the currency here that is why evereyone puts it after the amount . please make the change for Romania.

Review.Titre: If we were able to sync our…
Review.Contenu: If we were able to sync our appointments on the website that would be great. Also, we have noticed some communication errors where our customer's try to message us over the website and we don't get them or the email notification. If these things were fixed, we would love to continue using SITE123.

Review.Titre: It is a very good site with friendly…
Review.Contenu: It is a very good site with friendly assistance however, when I want to add things onto my website like my ABN into my footer I was told I cant. I also cant use any payment gateway that requires me to type in specific code. Other than that it is pretty good.

Review.Titre: Gets expensive over time
Review.Contenu: The costs for my second year were notably more expensive. In truth my website has not generated much (if any) additional business. Maintaining it has just become and additional business task.While Site123 is relatively simple to use, there are some specific issues I have had. One is that I cannot create an item menu for my business and simply upload it. I have to completely recreate it on Site123. Likewise, I cannot create it on Site123 and then download that to print it locally. This is a major flaw in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Good service but got rather confused
Review.Contenu: Good service but got rather confused, looks of jargen which I did not understand. Got the email wrong but online chat service helped to sorry me out. They were very good indeed. Only thing I would say is that older people like me might want a phone help service as we find talking to a person easier.

Review.Titre: I will give 5 stars
Review.Contenu: I will give 5 stars. But today I saw that an important mail is landing in my spamMails. And I was very sad because it was a new client who was asking me for dogwalking and she need answer soon. But I saw it today in the spams one week to late 😠😠

Review.Titre: The site is not very user friendly
Review.Contenu: The site is not very user friendly. Emails don't reach me directly. I get a notification from STE re emails and when I click on it I only get one word and no communication. I would prefer for clients to be able to contact me directly via my email address and not go through STE sites first.

Review.Titre: This is a good platform for active and…
Review.Contenu: This is a good platform for active and effective online presence. Main difficulty is it's video and YouTube video uploading process. If this is made easier and direct quite like the process of video uploading in YouTube, then 123 will be the best in online web and blog business.

Review.Titre: Although your team is wonderful & I've…
Review.Contenu: Although your team is wonderful & I've had absolutely no issues with any of them, I've been unable to get effective step by step guidance to properly utilize your services, including my recently purchased professional package. To the best of my knowledge there are now 3 websites in my name. With the exception of the 1st one "freegiftfrom..." I'm not clear how to proceed with either of the other 2. I'm told login details are an issue however I'd love to have your help to reset that so that I can get on with business and we can build each other up! Thanks for this opportunity to air my views especially as someone new to website development. Let's fix the issues soon please. Thanks again.👍🏽💻📉🌻

Review.Titre: Well you need to improve a lot in your…
Review.Contenu: Well you need to improve a lot in your site as i found missing options and support told me these options will be available when i will purchase. How can i purchase if i am not satisfied. All what i needed got it for free trail and i registered with them. so you lost one customer.

Review.Titre: Beginning my website.
Review.Contenu: I was a very difficult client, I believe, because I am not at all website savvy.   The folk who attempted to assist me were as helpful as they could be, but my understanding is limited.   I DID have a Zoom call with Samuel and he is a very gifted 'teacher', and he made it possible for me to make some progress.   However, I believe my own computer is just Windows 8, and I think that the screen doesn't show all that it is supposed to.  I still do not know how to upload my artwork that I don't want to sell online.....I just want to upload them with the advice to contact me via email or phone if they are interested in purchasing.

Review.Titre: Quite easy to use, however---
Review.Contenu: Quite easy to use and I made what I think is a good site! - - - but I haven't had much footfall so am a bit disillusioned. I have had more c orrespondance in my Facebook page which isn't nearly as well organised! Your agents are helpful but I still don't get anyone.

Review.Titre: The site itself is excellent and user…
Review.Contenu: The site itself is excellent and user friendly. Unfortunately users in South Africa are limited to choosing a reputable pay gate. Only supported by 2 checkout which unfortunately has extremely bad reviews. I had to cancel my subscription due to these limitations.

Review.Titre: I was hoping site 123 will have all the…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping site 123 will have all the tools I need to promote my website and business but that’s not the case. Here are some of the improvements that are required.1. Cannot upload videos while sending email on a new message. We need to be able to upload you tube videos or copy embedded code and insert into our content to attract visitors.2. Maximum emails can be sent a month is only 10000 email. Need to increase this to 20,000 emails as a minimum.3. I need to be able to edit my website not through site123 tagging.These are the improvements required for now in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Just so-so on customer service
Review.Contenu: Have had to contact them on several issues.  Seems that the responses I am getting back are "canned" ones that they typical just copy & paste from a book.  They never seem to know what to tell you until they have "looked at a manual" or other sources.  Also it doesn't give me a straight answer, it's just in the neighborhood of what to do.  I have to dig around to find what I need or hunt thru the website to locate how to do something.  Personally I wish that I could change the color of the texts in areas that I want it to pop out for my customers. Haven't been able to find that if it's even supported.

Review.Titre: Our website still does not show up when…
Review.Contenu: Our website still does not show up when searched for it. The fact that when orders are placed, there is no way to do a progressive order number, that is just nuts. Our old website could do that no problem.Your folks on the chat line have been pretty helpful.

Review.Titre: Good but with room for improvement
Review.Contenu: I like idea of your site. Relatively easy to put up page with few minutes. But relatively advanced  stuff is hard to do.I think that CEO is not as good as it should be. After two years of my page online i'm still not on first or second page while one of my pages I made with wordpress (With little knowledge of wordpress and no knowledge of coding) are on first pages of searches. There every word is counted for searches while here not....My goal is to "develop" web shop and to get some revenue from it, but for now I have paid more for page (Your yearly fee and domain) than i got from webshop...

Review.Titre: it is nice to have a website but a…
Review.Contenu: it is nice to have a website but a little pricey

Review.Titre: Very Simple but enclosed
Review.Contenu: Very Simple.Easy To use.Could be so much much better with more interesting and creative templates.Could be Powerful if exist the possibility to add more content to each page, after the closed template. I mean, add photos and text boxes.

Review.Titre: my bank card screwed up and I have had…
Review.Contenu: my bank card screwed up and I have had to sort it all out. Being severely disabled, it has taken a lot of time and effort.

Review.Contenu: Hi  your program its good but ,I have a question there is couple of days that when i am trying to go to the edit page it takes long time to open around 30 minutes. how come and can you please check what is the problem. Thank you

Review.Titre: Company name not in link/website
Review.Contenu: It was cool setting up the site, wish there were more background options. Also as a free site, my company name is not in the link/]website and that is the worst part of it.

Review.Titre: The best experience for me 🙂 s your…
Review.Contenu: The best experience for me 🙂 s your support, that is exceptional but I am of the opinion that the site needs a lot of training materials like videos to help us redesign the templates to our liking.

Review.Titre: When it comes to creating a nice…
Review.Contenu: When it comes to creating a nice website this is a great site. Easy to use and the people are very helpful and always available. On the other hand I don't find their email set up for sites very user friendly.

Review.Titre: A good start to progress..
Review.Contenu: Easy treatment in using the site and good treatment of the people working on improving the services. Thank you for the good treatment

Review.Titre: Great assistant service
Review.Contenu: Great assistant service!  Some of the design was not very flexible ( like changing the horizontal length of text box and making links on the text are not possible) and I hope those will be improved.

Review.Titre: Online customer support is great !
Review.Contenu: Online customer support is great! They also reply client questions in the weekend. Michael

Review.Titre: I've been waiting over a week for a…
Review.Contenu: I've been waiting over a week for a domain setup, every time I contacted support I was told that my problem would be solved within 48 hours, but nothing changed.P.S. It's been 2 weeks since I bought a domain from their website and made a request to set up a domain. Nothing has changed, the site is not workingP.S.The site team contacted me and answered not all my questions, but I don't understand, if the team knew that the letter was sent to me, then why they kept asking me to wait for the problem to be solved. But I am still grateful that they were able to answer me and solve my problem

Review.Titre: Wouldn't have said no to a simple pdf…
Review.Contenu: Wouldn't have said no to a simple pdf viewer in the website.

Review.Titre: Great helpdesk
Review.Contenu: Great helpdesk, easy to edit the websites and great price to quality ratio

Review.Titre: Requires Futuristic Designs
Review.Contenu: The designs should be like in the new Genth not the old generation design. Make it more futuristic.

Review.Titre: Pretty easy to use
Review.Contenu: Pretty easy to use.  It would be helpful to have a description if each layout's underlying functionality of each layout up front... where calls to action or categories can be added. A lot of trial and error within each page type.

Review.Titre: Easy to use site builder
Review.Contenu: Easy to use site builder and lots of templates available.   Some long term issues getting live help eventually got fixed.   Overall a good service .

Review.Titre: Easy and Supportable for non expert business' clients
Review.Contenu: A very good experience, easy to use, and the support is convenient and fast

Review.Titre: Satisfied Customer
Review.Contenu: It was easy to set up a website with the company, even though I was very new to this. The on line advice was also very useful and you feel there is someone to support. The upgrade service so far seems value for money allowing to create your own unique domain and giving enough storage for uploads.

Review.Titre: Easy and Convenient to Use.
Review.Contenu: Easy and Convenient to Use.Still few basic features need to be added.Login with Password (Instead of OTP)Downloads & upload of content.Few more, but overall smooth and covers quite good features and templates.

Review.Titre: Chat help was helpful
Review.Contenu: Chat help was helpful.  Not as difficult as other pages I tried to build.  However, I still need to learn more about all the functions.

Review.Titre: The fact you can put a basic free…
Review.Contenu: The fact you can put a basic free website together yourself is great, that said, there are areas I struggled with. I cant correct a spelling mistake on my top page cant find out how, so for that it loses 1 star.

Review.Titre: I made contact with them via email and…
Review.Contenu: I made contact with them via email and chat line, and spoke to 2 different people. Both of them were polite-patient-and understanding. You can't do better than that. !!

Review.Titre: good
Review.Contenu: goodIm building my site by myself, dont have so much experience, I like that is easy and the fact that I could have the help but some guys are very goods (spanish and english) bute the are some ones others (service uin french) that they doesn't known very well their site, or the doesn't interest.

Review.Titre: Easy, free platform with great service
Review.Contenu: SITE123 is fantastic. It is very easy to use and the staff which you can talk to on chat are really great - they always take into account feedback and suggestions and provide great advice. I would reccomend it for anyone starting out with a business and its completely free to begin with, if you like it you can upgrade to premuim packages.

Review.Titre: Quick, easy, professional outcome
Review.Contenu: Quick and easy, & much better than other sites. Ont bothersome thing was the constant chat box popping up in front of my screen which distracted and made things take longer because I had to contstantly minimize, which by the way also was not easy...there was no minimize box, only an x out which created new chat boxes. Another improve, would be to make clear prior to picking a design which ones have url addition capability or image etc...so adding a filter button.

Review.Titre: Purchase price vs customer service
Review.Contenu: There was a misunderstanding about the payment. What Site123 meant as the equivalent of monthly payments looked to me as actual monthly payments. I had to go with a shorter plan and get a partial refund as a result. Their customer service is great & guided a novice thru the whole process of creating a unique website in record time.

Review.Titre: Site123 is the easiest website among the competitors
Review.Contenu: Site123 is the easiest website among the competitors I have ever used, its not just a site builder is an institute for beginners as well, the more you work with it more you learn gradually, some issues with store kind I just can not find, the compression, and the sorting tools by brand or size, etc.

Review.Titre: Great on-line support
Review.Contenu: The on-line help was very responsive when I had questions about the site.One thing I do wonder about and am planning to follow up on is the fact that I paid for two years of support and was then told I was eligible for one free year.  My expiry date, however, shows 2024, two years from now.

Review.Titre: Easy way to learn how to make a website properly
Review.Contenu: They helped me step by step and then the tutorials on utube helped some more. My only problem is with other sites you get to pick a domain name to use even before you are able to afford to register it. It's seen on Google or Bing  At Wix it's the domain name you pick with wix.com behind it. Kind of difficult even for friends to find you when your just listed as this long string of letters and numbers. I figure I'll learn how to make a proper blog here and then consider which to use and register by the price of the packages they offer.

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good. Very easy to setup new site and to make changes. Intuitive and good range of options. Help has been responsive. While free site works well, I upgraded to professional from the free site which good value on longer options. Couple of additional features which have asked about and they have added to possible future developments. If they implement those then no brainer 5 stars.

Review.Titre: hello
Review.Contenu: helloI worked a lot with WordPress and Shopify, but after discovering your site, I found that it is much easier and helps a lot in adding productsBut there are some important advantages that I did not find with you Example The listing of states is incompleteWhen choosing a template, all titles change with itStore backup cannot be takenBut with all this, I thank you very much because it is an excellent site and its advantages outweigh its disadvantages

Review.Titre: Supporter of the Support Team
Review.Contenu: The support Site 123 offer is second to none.  The support team are proactive in offering help and they are friendly as well as Knowledgeable. Nothing seems too much trouble for them and they are encouraging when you are putting your website together which is great!

Review.Titre: It was a great experience
Review.Contenu: It was a great experience, with mostly very helpful support. There was a difference in support however. First time right, use of open questions to get a good picture of the situation and understanding of the customers knowledge could be a point of attention for defining best further actions for some online support agents. But Emma and Michel definately met and overshooted my expectations: big thanks to both of them for going the extra mile! And the sharing of some snips/screenshots both ways helped me a lot bringing domain-website and emails together! KRGert

Review.Titre: Seems quite an easy site to use and the…
Review.Contenu: Seems quite an easy site to use and the customer support was very prompt (although I found the answer before I got a reply - the site really is intuitive if you think!)Only reason for 4 stars is the 24 hour limit on discounted prices. Irritating as I was just trying out and not ready to start building the site yet. Will now be shopping around.

Review.Titre: Wish it was more plug and play
Review.Contenu: I like how easy it is to use the site builder, but I wish it was a little more plug and play/drag and drop. I don't like that it is impossible to add a text box or do other edits like making different fonts and spacing. Still, it is a good, utilitarian site for what I need, and looks nice, with some good features, and is reasonably priced.

Review.Titre: I knew almost nothing
Review.Contenu: I knew almost nothing, but step by step by step I became better, I didn't become better just like that, if it wasn't for site123 and their great team, they were there for me all the time, they were never late. Now, in facing difficulties login into my account and the guys are with me I feel I gave them a pain in the neck. Conclusion, site123 and the team are amazing. Thanks to all

Review.Titre: The platform is very simple to use and…
Review.Contenu: The platform is very simple to use and you will use to it fast. You can build a website and put it online realy quick.The chap support was very helpful but  unfortunately, even if I had the Gold package, the Zoom support meetings was canceled by the support team three or for times.In rest is very helpful to build sites from personal blog to more complex commercial websites.

Review.Titre: Nouvel création de Site Artisanale
Review.Contenu: Sassenach-Créationjust a little regret...No information on the size and dimensions of the photos... so I have to redo all the photos of my articles smaller and re-upload them on my site... a considerable waste of time and money. Apart from this small downside, the interlocutors are very attentive, patient, courteous and very responsive.I recommend .

Review.Titre: I would have given 5 stars but site123…
Review.Contenu: I would have given 5 stars but site123 do not have enough payment gateways for the country I'm trading in, this will make payment options more challenging with debit and credit cards if I compare to my competition but the rest is very good so far

Review.Titre: Need Templates
Review.Contenu: Hello, it is very user friendly. It would have better, if we have many choice of website templates Eventhough it looks different, but most of the designs are almost similar. BUT I AM SURE TO BE YOUR PERMANENT CUSTOMER.

Review.Titre: Setting up the its own website is…
Review.Contenu: Setting up the its own website is simple and user friendly. The support is Quick and efficient. The referencing on Google is Good. I do not succeed for the moment to search it from yahoo?I need more time to understand the various few functionalities

Review.Titre: Good customer service around the clock.
Review.Contenu: Good customer service around the clock. Many oportunities for pages

Review.Titre: Chat support
Review.Contenu: I appreciated that when I had a question about how to do something on my website this month, the chat tool was helpful. My questions were answered right away. This is my first experience with a website and I'm glad I had some support.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: The process of building my site was very easy and I love the different templates and photos you can choose from. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because I had issued not receiving the email to verify and my domain was inactive until resolved. Other than that I really like site123

Review.Titre: Timely response but improve on help
Review.Contenu: Timely response to the enquiry but can improve on the actual help. instead of giving generic links could make it relevant to the specific case by looking at the source of the enquiry and giving help accordingly. That way we don't have to dwell on the same problem

Review.Titre: Intuitive and great support

Mt tech then used my second domain then to verify and point to my site and its back up. This could have been resolved way before if I had 1) been told to look for the email to begin with, and  2) been believed that I had not received said email. I did on this day finally get a helpful technician who worked with me to make it happen.  I really like my site. It was easy to set up and it looks wonderful. Review.Titre: The decision to go with SITE123 was not…
Review.Contenu: The decision to go with SITE123 was not a hasty one. Being in Australia I was primarily looking for an Aussie organization to fill my requirements. This was to be my first web site. I found SITE123 to be different to anywhere else. There web based app was very intuitive and free which was very attractive. Sure it's not perfect but my skills aren't either. Being an older person (approaching 80) my short term memory isn't what  it used to be but I found that what I needed to do in compiling a website was easy to follow. As I got into it more ideas started happening. The result turned out to be better than I expected it to be. The cost factor was very important as I was compiling the website for my  small local Presbyterian Church without a budget. Using my own limited resources I opted for the 5 year Professional deal which was surprisingly cost affective.Nothings perfect hence the 4 star review and some of the staff need to get a few more lessons on customer relation but I generally ignored that having been in sales myself for many years. We all have bad days. I was to use a domain that I had previously purchased wanting to get a site in the new .au TLD. I had no Idea how to transfer it but I was talked through it in an efficient manner.  Yes, I would rate SITE123 as a candidate for your short, It came out tops for me it could well be the same for you.
